review:
this movie must be included in the school syllabus. every child must understand the sacrifice given by veer sawarkar and his family in the freedom struggle as well as social reforms.
similarly, movies like the legend of bhagat singh and bose- the forgotten hero are a must watch.

this movie truly states the contribution of non-congress independence activists from india. he was one of the most notorious freedom fighter who pain in the a** of british government during independence movement. very good movie and i highly recommend people to watch it!
it's  a great film . i want it should shown in india very often specially in delhi and different  parts of  india.
very good film i am the impressive
